circumstances: While flying over the Trinity Bay, off Cairns, the single engine aircraft crashed into the sea some 16 km off Cairns. The pilot and a young boy aged 13 were injured while a girl aged 15 was killed. It appears that the aircraft was descending to the sea at a normal rate when it impacted the water surface and crashed.
probable_cause: No mechanical failure. Investigation concluded that the pilot had fallen asleep and descended gradually into the sea.
